title: Gnar Plush!
body:
I couldn't find one anywhere so i decided to make one myself. (i thought all my effort was for nothing when they made the riot Merch, but they still don't have one) I just wanted to show everybody!

For my first ever sewing project i think he looks awesome!

replies.body: I think i might try to make that next...
I do have one, but i have never used it to sell anything
Shame. If the price was reasonable I'd totally buy a Dino gnar.
D'awwww. Nice work! You got a lot of detail in there.
